response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its value and the effort put into its development, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional product. This price reflects not only its cost but also the potential return on investment for you. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 12000}
